info.name: Workflow Builder Lite API
info.description: API collection for Workflow Builder Lite - AI-native text automation

request.description: Check backend, database, and LLM status.

response.name: Get Templates

request.description: Get workflow count, run count, and last run.

response.name: List Workflows
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
        "name": "Intelligent Text Analysis Pipeline",
        "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:29.116Z",
        "steps": [
            {
                "id": "cmlj2v5fo0006ohgd2zuz0uki",
                "workflowId": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
                "type": "clean",
                "promptTemplate": "You are a text cleaning assistant.\n\nClean and normalize the following text.\n\nRules:\n- fix grammar and spelling\n- remove filler words\n- remove repetition\n- keep meaning unchanged\n- keep paragraphs readable\n- do not summarize\n- do not add new information\n\nText:\n{input}\n\nReturn only the cleaned text.\n",
                "order": 0,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:29.116Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj2v5fo0007ohgd3e0m5edq",
                "workflowId": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
                "type": "summarize",
                "promptTemplate": "You are a professional summarizer.\n\nSummarize the following content clearly and concisely.\n\nRules:\n- 4–6 bullet points\n- capture only key ideas\n- no extra explanation\n- simple language\n- no repetition\n\nContent:\n{input}\n\nReturn only bullet points.\n",
                "order": 1,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:29.116Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj2v5fo0008ohgdttvhi35d",
                "workflowId": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
                "type": "extract",
                "promptTemplate": "Extract structured key information from the text.\n\nReturn in this JSON format only:\n\n{\n  \"main_topics\": [],\n  \"important_entities\": [],\n  \"action_items\": [],\n  \"risks_or_issues\": []\n}\n\nText:\n{input}\n\nReturn valid JSON only. No explanation.\n",
                "order": 2,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:29.116Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj2v5fo0009ohgdqenyozyj",
                "workflowId": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
                "type": "tag",
                "promptTemplate": "Classify the following text into relevant categories.\n\nChoose 3–5 tags only.\n\nPossible tags:\n[\"bug\", \"feature\", \"meeting\", \"research\", \"documentation\", \"customer_issue\", \"planning\", \"general\"]\n\nText:\n{input}\n\nReturn tags as a comma-separated list only.\n",
                "order": 3,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:29.116Z"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "cmlj24uda0000pta2qefgus80",
        "name": "Workflow 2.0",
        "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:08:01.726Z",
        "steps": [
            {
                "id": "cmlj24uda0001pta2kc0g9avv",
                "workflowId": "cmlj24uda0000pta2qefgus80",
                "type": "clean",
                "promptTemplate": "Clean and normalize the following text. Fix typos, remove extra whitespace, and format consistently. Return only the cleaned text, no explanations.",
                "order": 0,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:08:01.726Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj24uda0002pta26rme9a2g",
                "workflowId": "cmlj24uda0000pta2qefgus80",
                "type": "summarize",
                "promptTemplate": "Summarize the following text concisely in 2-3 sentences. Preserve key information.",
                "order": 1,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:08:01.726Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj24uda0003pta24wxmsemx",
                "workflowId": "cmlj24uda0000pta2qefgus80",
                "type": "extract",
                "promptTemplate": "Extract the main entities from this text: people, organizations, dates, locations. List each on a new line in format: TYPE: value",
                "order": 2,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:08:01.726Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj24uda0004pta27alzczdr",
                "workflowId": "cmlj24uda0000pta2qefgus80",
                "type": "tag",
                "promptTemplate": "Assign 3-5 relevant tags to categorize this content. Return only comma-separated tags, nothing else.",
                "order": 3,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:08:01.726Z"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "cmlj1gh0a00061j9haaw7vbuq",
        "name": "E2E",
        "createdAt": "2026-02-12T05:49:04.666Z",
        "steps": [
            {
                "id": "cmlj1gh0a00071j9hqe6onopp",
                "workflowId": "cmlj1gh0a00061j9haaw7vbuq",
                "type": "clean",
                "promptTemplate": "Clean: {input}",
                "order": 0,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T05:49:04.666Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj1gh0a00081j9h38479f3q",
                "workflowId": "cmlj1gh0a00061j9haaw7vbuq",
                "type": "summarize",
                "promptTemplate": "Summarize: {input}",
                "order": 1,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T05:49:04.666Z"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "cmlj1g23000001j9hmsqseya1",
        "name": "E2E Test Workflow",
        "createdAt": "2026-02-12T05:48:45.317Z",
        "steps": [
            {
                "id": "cmlj1g23000011j9hgsu5akzv",
                "workflowId": "cmlj1g23000001j9hmsqseya1",
                "type": "clean",
                "promptTemplate": "Clean this text. Return only cleaned text.\n\n{input}",
                "order": 0,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T05:48:45.317Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj1g23000021j9hwjfjou5d",
                "workflowId": "cmlj1g23000001j9hmsqseya1",
                "type": "summarize",
                "promptTemplate": "Summarize in one sentence.\n\n{input}",
                "order": 1,
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T05:48:45.317Z"
            }
        ]
    }
]

request.description: Create a new workflow. Requires: name, steps (2-4). Step types: clean, summarize, extract, tag. Use {input} in prompts.

response.name: Create Workflow

request.description: Get a single workflow by ID. Set workflow_id or use from Create Workflow.

response.name: Get Workflow

request.description: Update an existing workflow. Replace workflow_id.

response.name: List Runs
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": "cmlj31e47000fohgdc220d7d9",
        "workflowId": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
        "workflowName": "Intelligent Text Analysis Pipeline",
        "inputText": "Hi team, during yesterday’s testing we noticed that the payment gateway fails for UPI transactions and sometimes double charges users. Customer support received 15 complaints. We need to fix the retry logic, add better error handling, and release a hotfix by tomorrow. Also plan a monitoring dashboard to track failed payments going forward.",
        "status": "success",
        "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:33:20.311Z",
        "outputs": [
            {
                "id": "cmlj31e47000gohgdu49n5bxe",
                "runId": "cmlj31e47000fohgdc220d7d9",
                "stepOrder": 0,
                "stepType": "clean",
                "output": "Hi team, during yesterday’s testing, we noticed that the payment gateway fails for UPI transactions and sometimes double charges users. Customer support received 15 complaints. We need to fix the retry logic, improve error handling, and release a hotfix by tomorrow. Additionally, we should plan a monitoring dashboard to track failed payments going forward.",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:33:20.311Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj31e47000hohgdjhjw5yiv",
                "runId": "cmlj31e47000fohgdc220d7d9",
                "stepOrder": 1,
                "stepType": "summarize",
                "output": "- Payment gateway fails for UPI transactions and double charges users.\n- Customer support received 15 complaints.\n- Fix retry logic and improve error handling.\n- Release a hotfix by tomorrow.\n- Plan a monitoring dashboard for tracking failed payments.",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:33:20.311Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj31e47000iohgd3f113loh",
                "runId": "cmlj31e47000fohgdc220d7d9",
                "stepOrder": 2,
                "stepType": "extract",
                "output": "{\n  \"main_topics\": [\n    \"Payment gateway issues\",\n    \"Customer support complaints\",\n    \"Technical improvements\"\n  ],\n  \"important_entities\": [\n    \"UPI transactions\",\n    \"Customer support\"\n  ],\n  \"action_items\": [\n    \"Fix retry logic\",\n    \"Improve error handling\",\n    \"Release a hotfix by tomorrow\",\n    \"Plan a monitoring dashboard for tracking failed payments\"\n  ],\n  \"risks_or_issues\": [\n    \"Payment gateway failure\",\n    \"Double charges to users\",\n    \"Customer complaints\"\n  ]\n}",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:33:20.311Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj31e47000johgdziye67rx",
                "runId": "cmlj31e47000fohgdc220d7d9",
                "stepOrder": 3,
                "stepType": "tag",
                "output": "bug, customer_issue, feature, planning",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:33:20.311Z"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "cmlj2vnk0000aohgdsnfwzjfx",
        "workflowId": "cmlj2v5fo0005ohgd4nu6dwag",
        "workflowName": "Intelligent Text Analysis Pipeline",
        "inputText": "Hey team, yesterday we discussed the login issue that many users reported. The app crashes sometimes when passwords are incorrect. We also planned to add Google OAuth and improve dashboard speed. There are still some security concerns around session handling. We need to fix the bug by Friday and schedule another meeting next week.",
        "status": "success",
        "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:52.609Z",
        "outputs": [
            {
                "id": "cmlj2vnk0000bohgd2qecjcaq",
                "runId": "cmlj2vnk0000aohgdsnfwzjfx",
                "stepOrder": 0,
                "stepType": "clean",
                "output": "Yesterday, we discussed the login issue reported by many users. The app crashes when passwords are incorrect. We also planned to add Google OAuth and improve dashboard speed. There are security concerns regarding session handling. We need to fix the bug by Friday and schedule another meeting next week.",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:52.609Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj2vnk0000cohgdnbe2yvyr",
                "runId": "cmlj2vnk0000aohgdsnfwzjfx",
                "stepOrder": 1,
                "stepType": "summarize",
                "output": "- Users reported a login issue causing app crashes with incorrect passwords.\n- Plans to add Google OAuth for login.\n- Aim to improve dashboard speed.\n- Security concerns identified regarding session handling.\n- Bug fix deadline set for Friday.\n- Another meeting to be scheduled next week.",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:52.609Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj2vnk0000dohgdy4rosnw1",
                "runId": "cmlj2vnk0000aohgdsnfwzjfx",
                "stepOrder": 2,
                "stepType": "extract",
                "output": "{\n  \"main_topics\": [\n    \"login issue\",\n    \"Google OAuth integration\",\n    \"dashboard speed improvement\",\n    \"session handling security concerns\"\n  ],\n  \"important_entities\": [\n    \"users\",\n    \"Google OAuth\"\n  ],\n  \"action_items\": [\n    \"add Google OAuth for login\",\n    \"improve dashboard speed\",\n    \"fix bugs by Friday\",\n    \"schedule another meeting next week\"\n  ],\n  \"risks_or_issues\": [\n    \"app crashes with incorrect passwords\",\n    \"security concerns regarding session handling\"\n  ]\n}",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:52.609Z"
            },
            {
                "id": "cmlj2vnk0000eohgdrz98hzms",
                "runId": "cmlj2vnk0000aohgdsnfwzjfx",
                "stepOrder": 3,
                "stepType": "tag",
                "output": "bug, feature, meeting, customer_issue, planning",
                "createdAt": "2026-02-12T06:28:52.609Z"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "cmlj2kecv0000ohgd7wtzhlce",
        "workflowId": "cmlj24uda0000pta2qefgus80",
        "workflowName": "Workflow 2.0",
        "inputText": "Ì̷̧͍͉͕̇̋͒̓͑̋ ̷̢̨̼̞͚̻̙̗̩̼̍̔̔̃̈́̊̽̑͝͝͠h̶̡̰͎̮̹͎̫͍̜̫͚̮̀͊͜a̴̳̯̱̤̙̥͙̽̐̇v̶̧͎̼̺͍͓̝̳͖͔̱̬͚̽̍͜ͅë̴̱́̍̂̋̇̈́̑̉̿̑̊ ̶̖̭͙͈̭̐̄̎̿͘t̴̲͓̤̘̍̓͋̇̆̾̓̓ơ̷̧̢̨̦͕͎̟̞̪͙͙̞̰̝͑̎̋̿̓̓ͅ ̸̙͎͕̝͍̫̳̰̲̜̭͒d̷̟̈́̃́̾̄͋͆̓̌̓̃́o̵̡̨̳̼͚̼̦̍̀̿̔͒̕ ̵̢̳͖͍̮̞̠̙̪̘͚̌́̿͘ṭ̴̤͙̬̞͂ḩ̵̺̫͎͇̜̦̩̙͖͈̱͑̅͗̈͗̽̓̋̒̽͜͝i̸̧̧̮̜͍̩̮͈̩̹͋͐͒́̂̊̅̔s̵͍͝ ̵̗̙͇̭̳͍̺͉̝́͂̈́͌̑a̵̭̦̱͇͔͌̋͌̉̈́̒͊̀̓ş̶̛̦̤͙͕̖̺̞̖̦̓̂͗̃͛̕̚͜ͅs̵̨̧̟̓̒̀́̄͗̂̈́̾̀̒̓̚͜ȅ̵̡̡̜̣̪̖̂̊̀͜s̷̡̳͈̺̠͍̗̗͈̞̗̰̤͔̑̑̑̇̾̀̆͘͝ş̴̪̱̖̲̣̺̟̣̲̥͍̔͌̌́̍̊͂̌̑͋͂͋̅̕͝m̵̛̪̖̳͙̭̺̅́̋̆̉́̀͘͝ȩ̷̦̝̟̰͑̓̅̋̎͂̔͗̕͜ͅņ̴̧̫͈̤̠̲̃͒́̈̽̕͠ţ̷̢̛̦̫̼̖͔̹̹͕̍͑̐̕ ̶̥̣̙̤̪́̈̉̔į̶̥͓͛̂̏͌͒̓͑̂͑͑̈͒̌n̶̡̧̛̞͔̮̖̙͎͕͎̑͛̊̌̽̏́̓̂͐̀̈́ ̷̧͎̻̹̻̹͙͖̒̾̿͆ẗ̸̡̡͖̺̤͖̼͔͙́̐̊͐̍͛͑͘̕͠h̶͈̟͕̞̏̃̃͑̅̃̔ḛ̷͖̞̗̜̰̬̞̿͒̈́͂͆̋͂͌̀̇͌̚͝͝ͅ ̸͈̮̹̺͔̾̇͗̃͐̂͐̍̇̆̐͆̕͝h̶̡͇͎̳̞͙̗̩̲͖̫̍̋̉̓͜͝ͅĭ̵̧̛͈͎̫̫̥̹̹̎̀͜g̶͓̲̎̈́̽͗h̶͎̦̠̖̋͒͐̀̽͆̿̈́̚͝ę̸͖̭̞̺̆̿̔̀͌ͅş̶̻̹̲̦͇̩̮̄̕͜͜͠͝ͅt̷̩̤͈̻̤̞̗̣͍́̄̈́͒̃̉̊̓̿͋́͋̚ ̸̧̳̤̯͚̪͖̺̠͉̫́̆͆̇̏͗̑̂̾̿̈̏̚p̵̡̺͉̮͔̟͙̠̟͐̈́͂͆ͅơ̷̛̝̝̠͙͚̺̐̉̏̓̐̂̈́̅̌͘s̴̠̑̇͘s̶̥̹̣̫͕̃̀̈́̽̑į̶̡͚̰̪̳͖͔͚͓͔͚̓̚͜͜b̸̨̛͚͔͓̰̳͚̀̈́͌́͑͌̍͑͗͘͜l̷̛͎̦̫̪̖̜͒̈́̾̊͊̔̀͝ͅȇ̷̱͗̍̈́̐͌̇̒̕ ̴̹̑̏̐̇̕͝b̸̧͙͇̥͕̪̣̖̭̥̪͉̋̿̀̇̃̃̏̑̔͌͝ͅo̵̡͙͚̙̠̰̹̝̦̰̥͖̘̹̔̑͑͂͠n̴̨̢̜͓̹̗̅͑̃ŭ̴͉̦͇̫̹̦̩̟͙̇̓̊͊͌̇̇͛͒̀̍̚͠s̸͖̮̬̭̻̹̯̦̟̻͖̀ͅ ̵̟̠͍̼͈̾͑͊͋̆̏̌m̸̢̰͙̲̘̟̭̫̩̭͕̹̩̽̈͒̂̊̈́͂̿̍͒̓̚͝͝ͅa̷̢̛̩̳̠̲͈̤̓ͅr̵̩̔͗̍̂̃̾̃̃̉̓k̶̞̬̗͙̱̠̫̩̚͜ś̶̡̰͈͔̘̋͌̂͑̊̔̇̈́͂̏͆̽͘͜͝ ̸̨̨̣̹͇͓͕̬̻͖́͛̇̆͒̈̐̏̈́̎͆̓͘̕ȧ̷̛̖͙̘̻̰̘͉̱̳͍̖͖̏̈̉̒̉̃̊̚͠ń̷͇͈̠̮̜̪̻̯͙̗̓̌̎͛̂̑̄̃̊͌͜ͅd̸̨̘̪̿̒͝ ̸̛̲̜̙̥̙͈̃͆͒͑̅͛̈́́̿̕b̶̯̪̥̭̱͇̠̀̋è̸̮̭̝̣͒́̂͌̍̽̓̕͘͝ş̷̠͇̞̰̰̣̣͚̖̤̼̳̝͂̾͛͂̈́͗̏̏̅̄͗́̑t̸͍̳̙̤̺̫̪͉͙̖̥̲̜̙͆̈́̍̐̄͋̑̚͠ͅ ̵͙̟̣́̍̃͊͝p̶̢̡̢͚̘̫͙̱̼̳͔̺͑̐͒͆̂̽́̿̂͘͘͠͝ͅơ̵̺̥̥͓̰͚͖̝͌̌̚͘ͅs̷̙̦̻͔̖͌̽͑̔͆́́͗͜s̴̨̟̯̭̭̭̝̱͈͈͚͔̎̆́͋̎̋̇̏͊̉͆͘į̵̦̭̬̦̰̻͍̫̺̊͜b̸̛̝̲̦̪̙̞͚̠͘l̶͉͊̃̓̉̊̆̓͌̋̿̃̔̏̓͠ě̶̡̛͎͔͕̬̖͊̈́͆͝ ̶̞͇̹͍̼̠̞̤̭͚̳̄̊̈́̍́̽̈́͠ͅw̴̡̧̘͓̼̝̘̼̫͉̞͕̝̥͌̿̒̆̅͂͜a̴̫̩̪͎̱̻͉̪͘͘͠͝ȳ̶̡̡̦̝̜̭̤͓̩̱̂͠s̴̛̤͓̈̇̑̂̅ ̷̦͚̹̳̙̑̊̐̒̍͋̇̄̓̍̊á̷̹̙̘̞̎̍͑͋̽̊̂͛͊̚͝ṋ̶̨͎̘̟̙͖͍͓̬̥́̅͑̈́͋͐̊d̴͇̭̱̳͚̜̄͝ͅ ̶̛͕̖̘̝͇͇̙̞̤̠͐͋̉̀̌̾͋̀͗̚̕ḅ̶̨͕̤̖̹̜͎̓̾̔̌́͝ȩ̵̬̪̟̳̱̝̂̌̾͂̔̃̅̔͗͘͝s̵͉̖̲̺̖̈́͝͝ţ̵̠͉͈̣̳̰̞̦̦͉̔̉͋͐̾͛͜ͅͅe̷̬̤̟̫̘̗̽̎͒̓͊̍̀̂͒̓̓̚͠͝ś̵̪͌͋́́́̎̈́̊͒̔͛̚͝͝t̸̨̨̙̬͉̟͙̬̯͈̦̞̮̊̏̈́̄̈́̊̄͐̀̏̅̈̈͘͘ ̵̡̪̦̤̭̙̾̓̀ȁ̴̯͌̚m̷̗̱̪̹͉̻̼̌̈́̐ò̸̤̰̅͛̃n̶̦͓̺̜̯̈́́̀̍g̴̦̲͔̱̯͉͉̞̘̥̹̈́̀̌̔̄̊̽ͅ ̵̛͚̘̎̅̍̐̌̀͗͋̀̋̓́͂͝ǎ̵̢̳̼̭͖̝̱̺̱̼̝̘͗͆̇̒̊̓̀̀͋͜͝l̴̪̭̝͚̞̀̿ļ̴̧̛̻̦͉̗̖̩͍̓̀̅̄̀͜͝ ̶̟̬̰̫͓̖͓̫̠͙̭͊́̈́̆͂̔̒͆̂̐́͐̕͠ͅt̶̤̜̟̟̣̒h̸̨̛̛̖̯̲̖̗̞̳͊͛̃͛̌̾̿̿̉͛̃̕e̸̱̰͊̉͌͐́̌̀̔̋̐̿̽ ̸̢̳̝͇̱̦̝͓̬͙͂̈́̀͒͛̅͑̅̊̓̚̕͠͝ͅͅs̸͈͓̦̳̈́͐̃̓̄͋̕̕͠ư̴̢̢̫̹͙̳̪̤͙͐͌̀͠b̷̜̈́͝m̴̧̡̖̟̲͓̊͑̐̓̈͋̈͆͂̔̍͜͝i̷̹͇̼͖̺̇̎̑̀̉͂̇̚͠s̷̗̩̟͕̤͔̰̈̌̆͑̈́͜͠͠s̷̨̢̤͉̦͕̟̪͉͚̞̻̬̆̂̎̉̏̏̀́̈́̓̉͑̕͜͝ĩ̸͙̦̜̮͗̓͒́̍̍͘o̵̢̡̻͖͔̯̱͇͖̠͌͗̈́̉̅̍̇ͅn̷̥͉̙̬̈́̈́͆͑̀͂̇͗̂̃͑̈́̍̉ ̷̰̫̫͓̯̳͆̐̊̔̾͆̍͌͠,̷̡̜͙̬͖̟̟̤̩͍͉̹͕͒̾́̈́͐̃̐͂̕͜ ̴̬̙̦̭͈̯̣̯̘̯̜̀̾͐͆̀̔̂͂̑̀͐̿͆͠͝w̴̨̛̻̗̙̏̿̍̊̽̈̂̉͒̒͝͠r̶̡͇̱͕͍͇̬̫͗i̶̧̺̳͚̰̰̖̯͑͆̂̆̃t̵̨̢̞͖̼͇̻̙̪̺̝̩̣̣̝̔̉̉̒͘ȩ̴̢͖̠̣̲͓̰̬̳̝̭̜͉̒̍͂͛̏̆̋̕̕͝͝͠ͅ ̴̠̈́̅̈́̈́͑̿͋̄̕a̵̛̺̙̹͔̍͛̏͛́̐̚̚͜͠ ̴̧̞͚̰̙̻͕͈̝̪̙̏̂͒́͆̀͆̕̚ǧ̶̨̧̹͔̝͚͙̖̖̼͕͔͍̝̬̈́̾̈́́̉̚o̸̳̰̙̻̪̜̠̫̪̞̿̐̀̔̏̍͒́̌͐̊̌̄̎͜͝ͅõ̴̻̞͗̈́͗̓̉̅͂̽̾́̕͠d̵͕̘̍͒͐͗̾̇̏̏͝͝ ̶̹̘̤̹̭͍̮͔̉̍͗͊̎̄̑̄̈́c̸̢̘̤̖̙̰͈̥͔͙̖̜͔͓̐̄͐́̐̂̈́̈́́̆̃̕͘̚u̵̧̮͖̠̞̭̹͖̩͈̮͉̹̻̺̔̋̆̌́̈́͑̒̈́̄͐̏̑͝r̸̢̭̠̀̌̕s̶̛̫̖̟͖̪̲̗̫̀͛̆̓́͆̿͋̚͝o̸̻͝r̶̨̞͍͈̻͇̝̲̫̤̭̟͖̔́́̈́̒̈́̂͐͗̓͐͊̕͜ ̷̢̛̱̜̮͉͖̟͛̾̈́̅͊̇͂͑̀ͅp̴̨̠͓̝͚̦͎̞̫̮͚̘͚̈͂͆̓̒̉̈̓r̷̛͍̘̝̜̺̎̈́̇̍̔͌̏̂̑͝ò̷͉͓̱͍̩͔͇̣͉̣͇̹̠̀͐̔̌̎̔̆̇̆͊̔̀̚͜ḿ̶͔̗̞͓͖͔͍͚̝̩͉̰̹͆͌͊̂̆͠ͅp̶̛̫̳̯̞̻̠̝̖̼̯̱͈̩͕͛́̔̈́͆̅t̶̡̨̢̫͉̥͚͈̘̙͓̱̣̪̎͋̈̄̊͆̓͊̎̏͝͝ ̷̨̧̡̧̤͍̠̟̜̣̤̲͓̻͖̾̔̒̂̽̎̔̾̓͗̽͆̎͝ţ̷̖̗̞̘̺͇͕̦̀̓̓̆̽̇͗̈́̅͋̈õ̶̢̥̬̦͇͖̝͙̉̐̾̊̈́ ̵̢̡̢̛̟̮̦̮̓̂̄͛͗͑̓̏̔̔̎̓͘͘ͅç̴̼͔͎̦͕͎̬̎̇̋̃͐̉̾͆̾̈̈́̐̀͘͘ǫ̷̡̘͙̱͇̥̘͓̣̞̩̹̼̂̐̂̓͘m̷̨͍̭̥̦͉̫̗͓̙̿̉̔̇̐̊̕͜͜͠p̷̘̺̤̞̗̳̜̌͑̇̓̇̑̍̀̋͘̕͝ͅͅl̸̹̤̬̰͍͎̹̩̘͈̍͋̔͛̎̈́͂̊͒͆̇͆̕̚͠ͅẽ̸̩̪̯̱̔̕̚͝t̸̡͈͔̘̠͎̃̈́̔̍̊̓ȇ̸̙̱͓̤̙̞͔̖̮̬͚͈ ̷͈̣̰͙̜̖̥͓̣̬̜̌̈̌̄͌̒̓͠ṫ̵̢̛͙̝̳̳̯̀͂͂̌̅̇͐̈́̆͌̽͜͠͝h̴͙̞̖̤̚ǐ̸͇̣͇͕͙̜̍̎̀̃͆͂̕ş̴̡̰͖̻͉̞̣͓͚͍̲̹͆̅̔̔̈́̐ ̴̗̬̻̠̼̾̾̑͐̅͋́͊͂̕͠a̶̧̛͙̞̥͎̻͔̺͎̗̩̪̓͊̄͗̅̄̎͑̕͜s̴͉̋̉̋͐̈̏̈́̑̓͊̀̈́͝͠ś̸̨̫̘͔͖͓̭̥̠̝͗͌̏̎̈́͋͂̿̃̎̕ï̴̧̛̙̮̝̞̫͚͙̱̦̉̽͐̒̅͛̔̆̒̉͠ǵ̵̣͋͒̿̈́̋̉̋̃̿͒̕͝n̷̯͚͎͖̫̲̾̀͗͆̂́̽́̀̇m̶̖̖̬̀͂͗̔́̾́̅̊̍́é̸̡̘͇̖͓̯̞̪̗͉͎̄͂͋͆̽̿̊̿̔̕͝͝͝ņ̵̘̪̠̰̰̞̫̀́̀͌́̈́t̶̢̢̢͔̲͎̬͈̣̅͌͜͝ ̵̲̗͕̺̏͗̀̅̋̂͐̐,̷̠͍̠̘̻͂̽̀̌̔͋́̃̈́͑̓͘͝ ̸͔̟͉̮̬͓̹͈͚̰̜̞̞͖̀̽͒͂͑͜w̵̡̛͍̹̯̜͇̼̟̹̔͌̌̀̽̑̇͠i̶̛͖̬̦̲͚̦͙̝̺̘̙͔͐́͆̇̋̈́̂̂̽̋̃̚͝t̴̗͎̥̜̦́̋̔͂̌͌͝ĥ̵̺̯̫͔͚̍̀̿̅̔̀͊͘̕͠͝͝ ̸̡̯̤̪̩̮͙̱̻͔̲̂͑̾̓̽̏̉̒̃̒͘͝n̶̨̢̙̻͚̩̺̝͎̪̘̳̩̑͒̈́͛̆͐̊̂̆̋̽͒̋̑͊͜ơ̵̹̟͇̮̞̼͕͌̓̽̈́̇̍͗͋́́͠͝ ̵̘̼̦̗͖̯͉̬̰͎̤̅́͆͘ͅc̴̨̧̯̙̯̱̩͕̓͊̏̏̚͠ǫ̵̢̨͇͈̳͇̀͐͌͘m̴̡̛̤̾͠m̴̦̟͖͕̳͍̭͛̆͆͌̃̉̃̎͛̀̚̕͝ę̸̨͎̟̝̘̘͔̇̄̊̍̌n̴̢̜̙͍̮͈̞͉͒̾̀̿͘͠t̴̨̛̰͔̳͌͑͒͑͛͐̄̑͘s̷̡̨̰̩̙̘͙̝̮̱̠͎̀̃̋̉̀́͆̀̓̅̿ ̴̨̱̙͈̺̘͎̜͎̦̦̳̼͕̄̏̔̔̔̃̍̉͘͠ǎ̸̢͎̙͔͉̜͔̱̉̇̾ñ̷̢̛̦̝͚̟̣̙̀̽̊̋̄̿̍͗̚d̴̨̪̹̜̐̃̎̊͛̕ ̴̰̮̤̠̘̹͎̙̮̭͒̒͜b̵̠͚̘͍̪̖̿̓̅͆͂͗͝ͅͅȩ̶̠͕̬̘̰̲̙̖̺̺̼͈̹̣̋s̶̛̙̺͑͛ṫ̵̨̨̛̛̪̟͍̝̦̞͓̦̖̓̔͐̕͝ ̷̡̤̭̑̂̆͗́̎̚͜͝ȧ̵͚͚̱̯̦̭̗͉͈͇̲̏͗͗͘͜ͅr̴̹͒̾̈́̽̐́̅͊̊̑̃̒̇͊̕c̶̫̈͋̽̎h̵̨̬͉̩̩̗̝̯̏̐͌́͂̎̽̓ḭ̸̧̧͓͎͍̗̜̥̬̫͍͎͚̘̈́̌̈̑̈́̓͌͘͠t̶̳͇̖̟̝̀̈́̓́̆͌͑̈́̇̊̌̽̚é̶͍̙̜̝̗͓̳͕͖͖͕̫͍̜̞̇̐͑̾̽̔̆̕̚̕̚͝c̶̢̫͓̺̦̈́͂̾̇͐͊̍̕t̶̨͔̹͖̣̠̱͈̝͖̓̈́̋͜ͅǘ̷̡̧͍̻͔̱͇̼̭͑̆͂̀̂̀͜͜ͅr̸̘̖̘̣͙̼͇̓͒̽̐̆̃̇̾͝é̸̡̢̧̩̦͔̹̘͍̋̀̇̍̂̐̈́ ̶̦̂́̎̆̓̍̏͛̓͑͆͊̕͝ą̵̖̀͂̈́́͛͗͊̍̈́̒͘ņ̶̖̲̼̘̺̦͉̞̈͑͂̍̉̍̎̽̕͜͝͠d̷͇̩̳̣͓̋̍̊́͘ ̸̗̘̹̝̖̣̖̖̫̓̄͆̇̾̉̄̀͘͘ͅs̶̛̰͈̲̳̲͓͍̠͚͋̀͊̿̓̾͛̕͜͝ͅo̶̧͈͚̗͚̳̲̓̍́͒̅̾̕ḻ̸̡̧͙͇͓̙̪͔̙̣̬̥͈̈̏̽̍̓̃̐̃̈́̕͠ỉ̵̖̙̹̟͚̀̔̃͑̋̈́̈̍̅d̵̢̯̩̈ͅ ̵̡̢̬͇͇̰͙̣̇̓͛̀͐̒́̚̕͝p̸̧̻̤͓̺̖̼̘̌̐̾̒̔͒͑̽̎̂̈́͋͘͠r̸̗͙̣̦͕̒͋͂̾̅̈̃̈́̚ͅi̷̡̧̺̻͔̜͊͛̎͂̓͆̓̀́͐̇͆̀̚n̴̡̬̝̘͕̼̣̭̰̹͉̲̆͑͌̈́̽̀͌͘c̸̛̳͊̄̅̊̂̓͒i̵̛̱̐̐͑̽̇̿͊̅̒͑̄̕͜p̶̡̳̝͚̗̬̝̟͙̖̫͇͆̏̈́̃̈͜͜ͅl̴̨̗̤̟͇̱͎͎͉͍͇̖̯̥̠̑͒̔̇̉̀̓͒̈͘̕͝é̶̗̮̩͈͎̟̘̱͉̩̪̐̊̂̑̃͂̈́̀̚s̶̢̢̝͍̫̥͚͎̣̻̫͙͙̻̏ request.description: Execute a workflow. Requires workflowId and inputText. Uses LLM - ensure OPENAI_API_KEY is set. workflow_id is auto-set from Create Workflow.

response.name: Run Workflow
